previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. FC Dallas | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 0, FC Dallas 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA and FC Dallas meet for the third time this season when the Western Conference foes clash in a crucial match Sunday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs. FC Dallas

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: So, MLS, any news coming this week on Chivas USA's future? Because this lame duck year isn't turning much around in the present.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Moises Hernandez (FC Dallas).
Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: BLOCK: Zach Lloyd heads away a dangerous cross

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marvin Chávez with a cross.

timelineItems.name: FC Dallas WUFC
timelineItems.text: @FCDallas #FCDTV why play Loyd at CB and Watson at RB with Keel and Zimmerman on the bench?

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chavez nearly does it. Great cross, very little pressure from Dallas. #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Antonio Vallejo González
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA vs FC Dallas with my nephews. # Vallejo #Chivas #ChivasUSA #FCDallas #Soccer #MLS #futbol#calcio #futebol

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Holy C&C Music Flashback here at StubHub Center #everybodydancenow #chvvdal

timelineItems.comment: Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Donny Toia (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Sturgis impressing as a box-to-box midfielder. Lets see if he can keep it. Meanwhile Toia getting forward, way forward #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Nathan Vance
timelineItems.text: I really don't like Loyd playing CB. Lack of height is worrisome on crosses. Much better at RB. #CHVvsFCD #FCDallas #DTID

timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Matt Hedges booked for colliding with Marvin Chavez

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Hedges (FC Dallas).
Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay in match Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chavez draws yellow card. Dallas really struggling to keep up with his pace #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Kyle Riese
timelineItems.text: I think Hedges may have just broken Chavez. #FCDallas #MLS

timelineItems.name: Alfonso Aguilar
timelineItems.text:
Chivas usa vs dallas 
#chivas #chivasusa

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt blocked. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Andrés Escobar.
Match ends, Chivas USA 0, FC Dallas 1.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Disappointing night for the 3,951 Chivas fans here. Very nearly did it on the final kick, but not quite #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Akindele's goal the difference as @FCDallas extends unbeaten streak to 7: http://t.co/Cg7HR8qugB #CHVvDAL http://t.co/LF3somKypn

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA and FC Dallas met for the third time this season when the Western Conference foes clashed in a crucial match Sunday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs. FC Dallas | August 3, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Offside, FC Dallas. Andrés Escobar tries a through ball, but Tesho Akindele is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Marvin Chavez gingerly walking toward the sideline with trainer. No es bueno por Chivas USA. Chavez has been indispensable #chvvdal

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Erick Torres tries a through ball, but Leandro Barrera is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marvin Chavez (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Marvin Chvez rockets it wide

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Je-Vaughn Watson.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Hmm, that FC Dallas offside didn't really look offsides from here #chvvdal #makeupcall

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Eriq Zavaleta following a corner.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).
Victor Ulloa (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Off the ball foul #thatsoMinda #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Dallas announcers (paraphrasing): Geez, Chivas USA aren't rolling over for Dallas. They're trying to play...imagine that!

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Love Castillo for his just shake-and-bake mobility. Yet, Toia able to keep up with him, stays on his feet. Great D #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Dr. Ash - The Chiro Guy
timelineItems.text: #dallas vs #chivasusa #espnbox

timelineItems.name: Gina
timelineItems.text: Not digging three in the back. This Barrera dude and Torres have TONS of space. #FCDallas

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Escobar.

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: So happy to see Perez, Akindele, Escobar, Castillo and Ulloa all back in the lineup for #FCDallas tonight. #DTID #CHVvFCD

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Donny Toia (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Marvin Chávez.

timelineItems.desc: Blas Perez (FC Dallas) shoots from the enter of the box, but it is blocked.
timelineItems.title: BLOCK: Agustín Pelletieri slides swiftly to deflect away a devastating Blas Perez strike

timelineItems.name: Kenna Owens
timelineItems.text: This game is lacking intensity. #FCD

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Fabian Castillo.
Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Agustín Pelletieri.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Je-Vaughn Watson with a great cross. Great player. Hope he stays in #mls for a long time and stays healthy #chvvdal

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Adam Moffat (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chris Penso is head ref for tonight replacing would-be Ricardo Salazar. No one knows why #unsolvedmysteries #chvvdal

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Blas Perez (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy easily takes care of powerful Blas Perez blast

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Je-Vaughn Watson.
Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Raul Fernandez quick reflexes no match for Leandro Barrera

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Eriq Zavaleta.
Attempt blocked. Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: DreamboatDan
timelineItems.text: Dan has a career GAA of 1.5 and he averages being awesome 100% of the time. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Eddie Magana
timelineItems.text: 😈⚽️🐐 #chivasusa #fearthegoat #mls #fcdallas

timelineItems.comment: Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Moises Hernandez (FC Dallas).
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: @FCDallas is unbeaten in six games but neither side really putting their brand on the game #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Kenna Owens
timelineItems.text: Adam Moffet should had out raffle tickets for all his give-a-ways. #FCD

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Chivas USA 0, FC Dallas 0.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Another chance created courtesy of Marvin Chavez. Absolute steal from #rapids96 no matter how you slice it #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: ericmerrigan
timelineItems.text: #fcdallas #chivasusa #football #soccer #clouds #sky #pretty #beautiful

timelineItems.name: _callistoo
timelineItems.text: #fcdallas  #dtid

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: It's 0-0 at the half in #CHVvFCD. It's a road match, so I guess I can't complain, but we at least should be doing a bit better. #DTID #MLS

timelineItems.name: Andrew V Watson
timelineItems.text: Not going to lie, body language from some of the players on the bench isn't exactly motivational. #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.name: Gina
timelineItems.text: "Why haven't we scored?!" selfie! #FCDallas http://t.co/Yjp2N2VNvi

timelineItems.name: Black Army 1850
timelineItems.text: Few but crazy #ChivasUSA #BlackArmy1850

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: Attendance at #CHVvDAL is awful. I really hope @cdchivasusa's new owners find a way to put life back into the club. #mls

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Chivas USA 0, FC Dallas 0.

timelineItems.name: ericmerrigan
timelineItems.text: #football #soccer #sky #clouds  #beautiful #pretty #chivasusa #fcdallas #fcd #chivas

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, FC Dallas 1. Tesho Akindele (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the center of the box to the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Tesho Akindele responds beautifully to a Fabian Castillo cross and puts it away

timelineItems.name: Cory Jensen
timelineItems.text: Super Mauro on. A blue turtle shell did that to his hair. #fcdallas #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Tesho Akindele finishes off a 4-pass combo to give FC Dallas a 1-0 lead over #ChivasUSA in the 49th minute

timelineItems.name: Mohammad Bushnaq
timelineItems.text: Oh my god. What a beautiful sequence. #FCDallas leads!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Adam Moffat (FC Dallas) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Moises Hernandez.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Tesssssho. Go on, rookie. #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Cory Jensen
timelineItems.text: That goal doesn't happen if @MoHernandez92 doesn't win that 50/50 at midfield. #fcdallas #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Akindele is making the Colorado School of Mines proud #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Sturgis backheel to Kaji draws raves from fans #chvvdal

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: 2013: Castillo > Perez > Castillo > Shot > Save 2014: Castillo > Perez > Castillo > Akindele > GOAL #CHVvDAL #MLS http://t.co/L6e8nUllcO

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Castillo again! Fans hoping FC Dallas were in for a long rebuilding project will be disappointed. What a core of young playmakers #chvvdal

timelineItems.text: @Ben_Jata @cdchivasusa what a turn by Mauro Rosales in the 62' to relieve pressure. Old man still has moves #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Thomas Schulz
timelineItems.text: @cdchivasusa's back 4 play so much calmer when @BocaBoca3 is on the pitch. Heal up #Captian, they need you! #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Such a cool finish, @Tesho13. 3rd goal in 4 games for the rookie: http://t.co/kVIlQWYcrr #CHVvDAL #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: 1 Chivas sub left. Thought Matt Dunn did plenty to deserve a second go-around #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name:  J3SS
timelineItems.text: MLS Chivas USA vs FC Dallas: 0-0: Halftime. Shout out to our friend Victor Ulloa #28 #FCDallas http://t.co/VTq6Wqm9po

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: I know it's easy to say this from the couch, so to speak, but I wish Chivas USA pressed more often.

timelineItems.desc: Zach Lloyd (FC Dallas) kicks away ball in front of goal.
timelineItems.title: CLEARANCE: Zach Lloyd skillfully boots away a dangerous ball right in front of goal

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Moises Hernandez (FC Dallas).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Offside, FC Dallas. Blas Pérez tries a through ball, but Fabian Castillo is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: On the plus side, Chivas have only a 1 goal deficit. Still only team in #mls with single digit home goals. #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Wonderful chance there for Chivas! Unlucky to have no one there to equalise. #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Ryan Finley on for Barrera. We haven't seen Fin and Cubo on the field together like we thought we would when Chivas got him #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Great cross from Kaji. Cubo just over the bar! Disgraceful chant following kick #chvvdal #dontcrosstheline

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Nice to see the crowd at the Chivas USA game is fantastic as always. #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA back line impersonating the RSL back line in the 79th minute. #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Joshua Duder
timelineItems.text: #CHVvDAL could end in a draw and I'd be happy, but a FCD win at least keeps CUSA from making up ground on PTFC in the race to avoid bottom.

timelineItems.name: Jorge Morales
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA #california #mls #BLACKARMY1850

timelineItems.name: Chris Corrigan
timelineItems.text: You know the #whitecapsfc season is getting nervy when our table position relies on Chivas scoring late. Come on Goats! Tie it up #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Castillo toying with Minda. #CHVvDAL #FCDallas http://t.co/W1s4a4vdWt

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Donny Toia (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ryan Finley with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Greyson Knutson
timelineItems.text: Canadian Tesho Akindele just keeps on scoring for #FCD...is this a guy #CanMNT needs to take a look at?

timelineItems.desc: Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) hits the left post with a left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left. Assisted by Tesho Akindele.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas).
Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: Loyd has been in beast mode tonight. #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Mohammad Bushnaq
timelineItems.text: Agree with Steve Jolley. Zach Loyd has been a monster tonight. #FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Tesho Akindele played division 2 soccer and Oswaldo Minda played in the World Cup. Just sayin'. #CHVvDAL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Wow. I could watch Fabian Castillo dribble around all game. #CHVvDAL #FCDallas

Gameday!

Es día de partido!

timelineItems.text: Sunday Sunday for my kiddos #stubhub#ChivasUSA#soccer#sundayfunday

timelineItems.name: Cecy💋
timelineItems.text: First #mls game! ⚽️❤️🍺 #chivasusa #withmynephews #thankstomygodson and with @its_cindy_anahi_bruh @v6tito

timelineItems.name: FC Dallas WUFC
timelineItems.text: #FCDallas starting XI: Fernandez, Hernandez, Hedges, Loyd, Watson, Castillo, Ulloa, Moffat, Escobar, Akindele, Perez #DTID

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: Boy that is a young back line for Chivas. #FCDallas doesn’t have many excuses in my mind to not score a couple tonight.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Even for #ChivasUSA this is a slim crowd at #StubHub Center http://t.co/SS1Igylj7W

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA using about 8 defensive players tonight, while Dallas are using about 8 attackers. Hmm...
